mapper.select: SELECT script_id, title, body, tags, pinned, created_at, updated_at FROM cypher_script_table ORDER BY pinned DESC, updated_at DESC, script_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cypher_script_table (title, body, tags, pinned, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{tags}, #{pinned}, CAST(strftime('%s','now') AS INTEGER), CAST(strftime('%s','now') AS INTEGER))
mapper.update: UPDATE cypher_script_table SET title = #{title}, body = #{body}, tags = #{tags}, pinned = #{pinned}, updated_at = CAST(strftime('%s','now') AS INTEGER) WHERE script_id = #{scriptId}
